content.prompt: Sentiments similar to those expressed in the report most directly contributed to which of the following developments in the late twentieth century?

choices.label: The development of the European Union during the Cold War
The development of COMECON in Eastern Europe
Ethnic conflict after the collapse of communism
The move by European nations to relinquish their colonies

topic.text: 9.5: Postwar Nationalism, Ethnic Conflict, and Atrocities

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
